sentences.en: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.cn: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

sentences.en: Eva’s busy drafting her speech for the conference.
sentences.cn: 伊娃正忙着起草她的大会发言稿。

sentences.en: He's now revising the first draft of his essay.
sentences.cn: 他目前正修改他的文章初稿.

sentences.en: I enclose here with a draft for the sum of 100 dollars.
sentences.cn: 兹附上100美元汇票一张.

sentences.en: I know that this draft text will need to be edited.
sentences.cn: 我知道这篇草稿需要校订。

sentences.en: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.cn: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.en: I'm supposed to have handed in a first draft of my dissertation.
sentences.cn: 我本该把论文的初稿交上去了。

sentences.en: I've made a rough draft of the letter.
sentences.cn: 我已经写好这封信的草稿。

sentences.en: Officials have now been delegated to start work on a draft settlement.
sentences.cn: 现在已经委派官员着手起草解决方案。

sentences.en: Payments must be made in U.S. dollars by a bank draft drawn to the order of the United Nations Postal Administration.
sentences.cn: 付款必须用开给联合国邮政管理处的银行汇票，并以美元支付

sentences.en: Please propose amendments and addenda to the first draft of the document.
sentences.cn: 请对这个文件的初稿提出修改和补充意见.

sentences.en: Ten days later Carmen received a bank draft for a plane ticket.
sentences.cn: 10天后卡门收到了一张用于购买机票的银行汇票。

sentences.en: The draft of this article has been finalized [ done ] .
sentences.cn: 这篇文章已经 定稿.

sentences.en: The draft resolution was adopted by a majority of 128.
sentences.cn: 这项提案以超过128票的多数获得通过.

sentences.en: The draft was revised several times before it was finalized.
sentences.cn: 稿子几经删改才定下来.

sentences.en: The money was payable by a draft drawn by the home.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱可凭国内承兑的汇票支付。

sentences.en: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.cn: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.en: We edited out some unnecessary words or sentences from the draft.
sentences.cn: 我们从原稿中删去某些不必要的词句.

sentences.en: We would rather withdraw the draft resolution than amend it.
sentences.cn: 与其修改决议草案,不如予以撤回.

sentences.en: You pay for the car by banker's draft in the local currency.
sentences.cn: 以本币银行汇票支付车款。

phrases.tran_cn: 抽风机；通风机；通气风扇
散装的，直接汲取的：从一个大容器中汲取的，如酒桶

trans.tran_cn: 初步画出或（写出）的；（设计、草图、提纲或版本）正在起草中的，草拟的；以草稿形式的；草图的
trans.tran_en: a piece of writing that is not yet in its finished form

trans.tran_cn: 草稿，征兵，汇票，运动员选拔
trans.tran_en: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form

trans.tran_cn: 起草，征召…入伍，选拔进职业队，选派
trans.tran_en: to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form
